sections.heading: to 24-18-4 - Recompiled.
sections.text:
Recompilations.â€” Former 24-18-1 to 24-18-4 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1985, Chapter 140, were recompiled as 32-9-1 to 32-9-4 NMSA 1978.

Laws 1993, ch. 77 recompiled former 32-9-1 through 32-9-4 NMSA 1978 as 32A-15-1 through 32A-15-4 NMSA 1978, effective July 1, 1993.
